topic: How to package stream processing using fastapi with Python 3.12+
prompt: Write a Python 3.12+ focused, accurate explainer for: How to package stream processing using fastapi with Python 3.12+

response_parsed.title: Packaging Stream Processing with FastAPI in Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This explainer provides a guide on how to implement stream processing using FastAPI, a modern web framework for building APIs, with Python 3.12+. We'll cover key points, code examples, version notes, and caveats.
key_points: Implementing a stream-processing API with FastAPI
version_notes: FastAPI version 0.72.0 or later is required for ASGI support
Python 3.12+ provides improvements to the async/await syntax and performance.
caveats: Stream processing can be memory-intensive, so efficient handling of large data streams is crucial
Ensure your stream-processing functions are optimized for asynchronous execution
